boardgame.name: La herencia
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Uno de vosotros recibe una noticia inesperada: el profesor Wilson, un pariente lejano de quien prácticamente no sabe nada, le ha dejado una suculenta herencia. Con una condición: deberá residir en la antigua mansión de su tío. Algo no huele bien en esta historia y el heredero, junto a sus compañeros, no tardarán en descubrirlo.

boardgame.name: Old School Blue Map #21
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This PDF contains Old School Blue Map #21. This is temple level 4 and rooftop maps. The PDF has multiple layers allowing the options for numbered/non-numbered areas, secret doors on/off, and grid/no grid and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

Publisher's blurb:

The June 10, 2022 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

boardgame.name: Tanbou Djab
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La guerra entre los Estados Confederados y la Unión ha estallado. Los esclavos de algunas plantaciones se han rebelado y en la hacienda de Sebastien Terresombre han aparecido inquietantes símbolos vudú. La tragedia se palpa en el ambiente al ritmo de los tambores que suenan en la lejanía... pero en Madison, nada es lo que parece.

boardgame.name: Hasta el Ãºltimo hombre
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La carta de vuestro amigo Jakub suena a desesperación. En Keszthely, el pequeño pueblo húngaro donde vive, casi no quedan hombres. Los que no murieron en la Gran Guerra, lo hacen a su regreso de forma sospechosa... ¿está ocurriendo algo terrible en el pueblo? ¿o quizás solo son figuraciones de un veterano soldado trastornado por la guerra?

boardgame.name: Demon's Hill Dungeon
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Blueprints Hand Drawn product line offers you old-fashioned maps for using in your adventures and campaigns. These maps are skillfully hand-drawn. Despite their old fashioned appearance, each map offers you a degree of customization, using the pdf technology at its best. A button on the Master Control Panel allows you to turn on and off the grid, eliminate the room numbers, get the walls filled, don’t show doors and furniture and many other options, depending from the nature of the map.

boardgame.name: Terror en Ebenalp
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Con una tormenta de nieve cerniéndose sobre sus cabezas, los investigadores llegan al hotel Aescher, un pequeño establecimiento situado bajo un saliente del monte Ebenalp, en los Alpes Suizos. Han sido reunidos por un amigo común, August Moss, un policía de Nueva York, que ha decidido investigar la extraña muerte de su hermano menor hace apenas un mes en estas montañas.

boardgame.name: Pilgrims' Inn
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Blueprints Hand Drawn product line offers you old-fashioned maps for using in your adventures and campaigns. These maps are skillfully hand-drawn. Despite their old fashioned appearance, each map offers you a degree of customization, using the pdf technology at its best. A button on the Master Control Panel allows you to turn on and off the grid, eliminate the room numbers, get the walls filled, don’t show doors and furniture and many other options, depending from the nature of the map.

boardgame.name: Abbey of Swords
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Blueprints Hand Drawn product line offers you old-fashioned maps for using in your adventures and campaigns. These maps are skillfully hand-drawn. Despite their old fashioned appearance, each map offers you a degree of customization, using the pdf technology at its best. A button on the Master Control Panel allows you to turn on and off the grid, eliminate the room numbers, get the walls filled, don’t show doors and furniture and many other options, depending from the nature of the map.

boardgame.name: Waterbridge - Manor and Wizard's Tower
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Blueprints Hand Drawn product line offers you old-fashioned maps for using in your adventures and campaigns. These maps are skillfully hand-drawn. Despite their old fashioned appearance, each map offers you a degree of customization, using the pdf technology at its best. A button on the Master Control Panel allows you to turn on and off the grid, eliminate the room numbers, get the walls filled, don’t show doors and furniture and many other options, depending from the nature of the map.

boardgame.name: Waterbridge - Waterfall Dungeon
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Blueprints Hand Drawn product line offers you old-fashioned maps for using in your adventures and campaigns. These maps are skillfully hand-drawn. Despite their old fashioned appearance, each map offers you a degree of customization, using the pdf technology at its best. A button on the Master Control Panel allows you to turn on and off the grid, eliminate the room numbers, get the walls filled, don’t show doors and furniture and many other options, depending from the nature of the map.

User summary:

This item presents a preview of materials later appearing in the series.

boardgame.name: El Cuchillo
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Vuestro amigo, el doctor Shandom os ha invitado a cenar y pasar una agradable velada en el prestigioso Le Cordon Bleu. Cuando os disponéis a ir a un bar para tomar una copa tranquila, a las puertas del restaurante una mujer ensangrentada con un cuchillo en una mano y un corazón humano en la otra se abalanza sobre el doctor para matarle. Por suerte, Shandom consigue huir, pero empezáis a percibir cosas extrañas, y todo parece estar relacionado con un descubrimiento azteca…

boardgame.name: Absurdia
boardgame.description:
Welcome to Absurdia! This card-based party game for 3-8 players will be sure to challenge you and your friends with absolutely absurd scenarios and arguments, with endless combinations of cards and infinite fun to be had! The goal of Absurdia is to be the first player to win 3 Question Cards. Two players face off each turn and play Hero and Support Cards that best answer the question. Each player gets 30 seconds to give their absurd argument as to why their cards answer the question better than their opponent's. The remainder of the group then votes on the winner, who wins the Question Card! The questions are ridiculous! The heroes are unlikely! The attributes are ludicrous! Get ready to flex your imagination and dive into the oddest of scenarios, because here at Absurdia we live by one motto:
It's time to get weird!

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: En el Umbral
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tu personaje se refugia de un chaparrón en una tienda destartalada llena de objetos extraños de alrededor del mundo… Y le llama la atención un tomo mucho mejor conservado que el resto, del que no podrá deshacerse ni en sueños.

boardgame.name: Mala sangre
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

España, años 90. Un grupo multidisciplinar que trabaja para el ayuntamiento de Fontenebra, una ficticia ciudad dormitorio, tiene la tarea de solucionar los problemas de salud pública de uno de los barrios más desfavorecidos, donde una niña ha sido atacada por ratas hace apenas unos días. Pero lo que encontrarán allí parece salido de sus peores pesadillas…

boardgame.name: Muerte en el expreso
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Un tren expreso semidirecto sale de la estación central de Boston a las 20:30 y llega a Greenfield a las 8 de la mañana, pero… ¿conseguirás llegar vivo al final del trayecto?
Aventura para un jugador y un game master

boardgame.name: Escape the Room: Murder in the Mafia
boardgame.description:
The ï¬rst thing you notice when you enter your ofï¬ce is Mickey Malone's dead body. Mickey was the chief enforcer for the local Maï¬a. You've had your run-ins with Mickey and might treat news of his death as welcome news, if it wasn't your gun on the ï¬‚oor next to him. Man, you hate Mondays.

Explore a complete replica of the crime scene to discover clues, solve puzzles, and ultimately prove your innocence in this immersive murder mystery adventure.

---

Escape the Room: Murder in the Mafia is an intermediate level tabletop escape room, with a playtime of 90-120 minutes.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Fin de semana en Bishop House
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Vuestro viejo amigo Nathan Bishop se ha casado y para celebrarlo os ha invitado a pasar el fin de semana en su mansión, Bishop House. Lo que tendría que ser un feliz reencuentro entre comilonas y relatos de batallitas compartidas está a punto de convertirse en una reunión demencial en la que la muerte es una mera puerta a algo mucho peor...

boardgame.name: SesiÃ³n fatÃ­dica
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Los Dale y los Pulver conocen lo sobrenatural de primera (o segunda) mano, así que se han propuesto desenmascarar a todos los videntes y espiritistas farsantes que se aprovechan de la credulidad de sus conciudadanos. Cuando reciben la noticia de que las sesiones espiritistas en casa de los Flint son cada vez más concurridas, no dudan un solo segundo en llegar al fondo del asunto… aunque lo que descubran quizá se les escape de las manos.
boardgame.rpgdesigner: MÂª del Carmen GonzÃ¡lez Monzo Â«Mary GonzoÂ»

boardgame.name: La maldiciÃ³n del peÃ±Ã³n del diablo
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Cuenta la leyenda que en el peñón del Diablo habitan sirenas preciosas que, en días soleados, se tumban en las rocas, pero que aquellos que se acercan demasiado a ellas no vuelven. Puede que solo sean cuentos de marineros borrachos, pero lo que sí es cierto es que se avecina un buen temporal y el farero, Tomas Hardy, no ha encendido el faro esta noche. El alcalde ha intentado contactar con él, pero no da señales de vida, así que os ha encomendado la misión de comprobar el estado de Hardy y encender el faro a toda costa… si podéis.

boardgame.name: Tidal Blades: Banner Festival
boardgame.description:
Flags of all colors dance in the wind as Navirians converge to Trawl for the long-awaited
Banner Festival.

Generate the most profits for your trading house by selling goods, befriending the right suppliers, and making bets at the watercraft race. Opportunities abound in the floating market, but only the keenest trader will prevail!

Each turn, aim to play the highest, mid, or lowest Merchandise card to unlock different actions.
Utilize multi-use cards in dynamic trick-taking bouts to gain an advantage over your rival merchants.
There are numerous paths to victory, but reading your opponents and timing your moves is the key to success!


All set in the glorious world of Tidal Blades created by Mr. Cuddington.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Dim Those Lights
boardgame.description:
This is a variation on a ring or ball toss game. The ability to have dimmed headlights was brand new and somewhat controversial in the early '30s, so it made for a trendy subject. The game includes a stand-up board or target with lithographed art showing three cars surrounded by a squad of five motorcycle cops. The headlights of each vehicle are labeled with a point value of 10 or 20 and each has a cupped tin tray underneath to catch a small disc and hold it in place.

The goal is to take your set of heavy cardboard discs - red or yellow - and score points by tossing them at the target and covering the headlights of the three cars. However, misjudging your aim and covering the headlights of the police motorcycles will instead accrue negative points!

The winner of the game is the first player to reach 100 points.

boardgame.name: Dungeon (squared)
DungeonÂ²
boardgame.description:
Long ago the Gems of Power were weilded by Heroes and Wizards. Commanding and combining them to subdue the powers of evil, and drive them from the land. Over time the heroes vanished and the Wizards aged, and retired. The evil returned, hiding in the dark depths and causing havok among the lands above.

The Gems have been found again... it is time to purge the evil once again.

In Dungeon (squared) take on the role of one of four characters and face the challenges of a randomly created dungeon.

Brave heroes prepare yourselves for adventure....

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014)
boardgame.description:
The Amazing Spider-Man 2 is an open world action-adventure video game based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man and the 2014 film of the same name. Developed by Beenox, it is the sequel to 2012's The Amazing Spider-Man (2012)The Amazing Spider-Man[/thing], and takes place within the same continuity, different from that of the films. The game's plot expands upon that of the film by including additional characters and elements from the Spider-Man comic books and other aspects of the Marvel Universe.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Amazing_Spider-Man_2_%282014_video_game%29 The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014 video game)]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.
